suspects.name: Jeffrey Dahmer
suspects.Facts: Jeffrey Dahmer is also known as the Milwaukee Cannibal. He murdered 17 men and boys between 1978 and 1991, and was sentenced to 937 years in prison for his crimes.

suspects.name: Ted Bundy
suspects.Facts: Ted Bundy was an American serial killer and necrophile who murdered at least 30 young women and girls during the 1970s. He was executed in 1989.

suspects.name: John Wayne Gacy
suspects.Facts: John Wayne Gacy was an American serial killer and rapist also known as the Killer clown, he was convicted of the sexual assault and murder of 33 young men and boys, most of whom he buried in the crawl space of his home.

suspects.name: Aileen Wuornos
suspects.disorders: antisocial personality disorder, Borderline Personality disorder
suspects.Facts: Aileen Wuornos was an American serial killer and prostitute who killed seven men in Florida between 1989 and 1990. Wuornos was sentenced to death and was executed in 2002 by lethal injection.

suspects.name: Richard Ramirez
suspects.Facts: Richard Ramirez was an American serial killer, rapist, and burglar who terrorized the residents of Los Angeles in the mid-1980s, he was convicted of 13 murders and several other crimes, he was known as the Night Stalker

suspects.name: Edmund Kemper
suspects.Facts: Edmund Kemper was an American serial killer and necrophile who killed ten people, including his paternal grandparents and mother,  between 1964 and 1973. He was sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole.

suspects.name: David Berkowitz
suspects.Facts: David Berkowitz, also known as the Son of Sam, was an American serial killer who killed six people in New York City between 1976 and 1977. He was arrested in 1977 and was sentenced to 365 years in prison.

suspects.name: Gary Ridgway
suspects.Facts: Gary Ridgway, also known as the Green River Killer, was an American serial killer who murdered at least 49 women in Washington state between 1982 and 1998. He was arrested in 2001 and was sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole.

suspects.name: Jerry Brudos
suspects.Facts: Jerry Brudos was an American serial killer and necrophile who murdered four women in Oregon between 1968 and 1969. He was arrested in 1969 and was sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole.

suspects.name: Herbert Mullin
suspects.Facts: Herbert Mullin was an American serial killer who murdered 13 people in California between 1972 and 1973. He was arrested in 1973 and was sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole.

suspects.name: Dennis Rader
suspects.Facts: Dennis Rader, also known as the BTK (Bind, Torture, Kill) Killer, was an American serial killer who murdered 10 people in Kansas between 1974 and 1991. He was arrested in 2005 and was sentenced to 10 consecutive life sentences.

suspects.name: Andrei Chikatilo
suspects.Facts: Andrei Chikatilo was a Soviet serial killer and cannibal who murdered at least 56 people between 1978 and 1990. He was arrested in 1990 and was sentenced to death and executed in 1994.

suspects.name: Peter Sutcliffe
suspects.Facts: Peter Sutcliffe, also known as the Yorkshire Ripper, was an English serial killer who murdered 13 women between 1975 and 1980. He was arrested in 1981 and was sentenced to 20 life sentences.
